description:

  I want to visit the EPAM career site
  So that I can apply for a job

steps.name: the city Debrecen is selected
the Find button is clicked
an open position should be displayed
the title of the position should be Test Automation Engineer
the location of the position should be DEBRECEN, HUNGARY
the hot label of the position should be hidden
the description of the position should start with: Currently we are looking for a Test Automation Engineer for our Debrecen office
